name: Race Yourselves VR - Demo
description:
***This is a demo version of Race Yourselves VR***

Your best competition is...YOU!

Get a KILLER WORKOUT doing 5 minutes of High Intensity Interval Training on your bike while competing against your own performance history and faster future self.

Demo limits you to 2 past performances and 1 future self.

WHAT YOU NEED

  • an Oculus Quest (install the game via SideQuest)
  • an exercise bike
  • a Bluetooth cadence sensor

HOW TO PLAY

  1. The game alternates between high and low intensity cycling
  2. The phases are: LOW, HIGH, LOW, HIGH, LOW
  3. LOW INTENSITY  = gently cycle to collect all the points
  4. HIGH INTENSITY = pedal hard to win!
  5. Gently tilt your head left/right to move across the road
